original_text: Consider from this day onward, from the twenty-fourth day of the ninth month. Since the day that the foundation of the Lord's temple was laid, consider:
korean_text: 너희는 오늘 이전을 기억하라 아홉째 달 이십사일 곧 여호와의 성전 지대를 쌓던 날부터 기억하여 보라

sentences.original_text: from the twenty-fourth day of the ninth month.
Since the day that the foundation of the Lord's temple was laid,
sentences.korean_translation: 주의 성전 기초가 놓인 그 날부터,
